text: dvE vAva dE#vasaqtrE dvA#daSAqhaScaiqva tra#yastri(gm)SadaqhaScaq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#strayastri(gm)SadaqhamAsa#tE sAqkShAdEqva dEqvatA# aqByArO#hantiq yathAq Kaluq vai SrEyA#naqByArU#DhaH kAqmaya#tEq tathA# karOtiq yadya#vaqviddhya#tiq pApI#yAn Bavatiq yadiq nAvaqviddhya#ti saqdRu~g ya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#strayastri(gm)- SadaqhamAsa#tEq vi pAqpmanAq BrAtRu#vyEqNA&&* va#rtantE &haqrBAjOq vA EqtA dEqvA agraq A&ha#raq - [  ] 18
